title: Demonic Horde

|castingnoise=5 |spellnoise=0 }} {{flavour|This spell calls forth a small swarm of small demons to do battle with the caster's foes (and sometimes with each other!).
You can sustain at most eight creatures summoned by this spell.}} '''Demonic Horde''' is a level 6 [[Summonings]] spell which summons 7 to 11 [[lesser demon]]s to the caster's aid. The duration and friendliness of the demons are all dependent upon your [[spell power]], though the number and type are not. ==Strategy== This is more of a utility spell than a flat-out offensive spell, as the monsters it summons don't dish out that much damage, even in a good-sized group. However, their sheer numbers and not-terrible defenses mean that most monsters will take a considerable amount of time to grind through them all, often buying the caster valuable time to escape or use [[smite-targeted]] attacks with less fear of repercussion. Think of it as an upgrade of [[Summon Butterflies]], except the butterflies have more durability and can occasionally even kill things. ==History== Demonic Horde was removed in [[0.14]].
